lines.text: It's Bucket O'Nothing! Surprise your friends, amaze your family, annoy perfect strangers!
Don't touch that dial, you're tuned to the Commercial Channel! All commercials all the time. An eternity of useless products to rot your skeevy little mind, forever!
[repeated line]
This is bad. This is VERY bad.

Guardian. To mend and defend - to defend my new found friends, their hopes and dreams, and to defend them from their enemies. They say The User lives outside the Net and inputs games for pleasure. No one knows for sure, but I intend to find out. ReBoot!
Prepare to taste the wrath of my... butterknife?
Are you a good user, or a bad user?
The future is not determined by the throw of the dice; it is determined by the conscious decisions of you and me.
System... out of danger?

[Frisket snarling]
Matrix! It's about time you got here. Call off your mangey mutt.
Frisket, Heel!
Powerlock. What happened here?
I caught these two trying to crash the system.
Hmm? Frisket, sniff!

[Frisket starts sniffing the spectrols and then turns his head towards Powerlock and growls]
Frisket always had a thing for viruses.
Stop. One more move and the system crashes.
No.
[the head spectrol tries in vain to keep Powerlock from crashing the system. A blast goes off cutting the line from door overhead]
Matrix watch out... Ooh!
Virus it ends... Now!
[Powerlock wails in pain as Matrix shoots him to destroy him]
System out of danger?
Yes.
Good. Where I go, I go alone.
He's deleted Slim.
That smashing come from behind victory was brought to you by soothing 32-bit lotion, because you itch.
He tasks me and I shall have him.
The jam is moldy in the kitchen and the rolling rabbit gathers no moss.
What are you talking about?
You blokes look uptight. You should try logging off, it relieves tension.
You got a deletion wish?
Shiver me templates!
[princess Bula is seven feet tall]
Is she really a princess?
No, you want to tell her different?
I don't think so!
Don't ever leave me again.
I promise.
You two be careful out there.
You too.
So much for me being Mr. Save-the-Day.
We Mainframers stick together.

[as Bob comes inside through a window]
Ever heard of a door?

[as his chewed-up zipboard flies through the window]
Ever heard of a Frisket?
Bob!
[runs to bowl Bob over]
Whoah! I think you're a little big for that.
Here! I'm here! Come and get me!
So many moods... so little time...

[communicating with young Guardian Enzo, via his key tool Glitch]
Awaiting your command, Guardian.
Glitch... uh...
[pause]
... firewall!
If it's cat and mouse, Bob, maybe we need some cheese!
NOBODY double-crosses The Mouse.
I double-cross whomever I please.
Oh! Somebody give me a hug!
Dot, stay frosty.
I'm glad you find this amusing.
Oh, I was just picturing what I will do to you once I am free from your little toy. You have no idea the power you try to control! Chaos will always triumph over order! It is the way of things.
Enough! Breach this firewall with your viral energies or suffer! Your choice.
I've got to help the User? Heh, there's a first time for everything.
Okay, big boy... let's party.
One all... this is the decider... come on, Enzo, keep it together... you can do this... you're a guardian, a machine... let's do it!
You can't speak in these things.
I never knew Dot was so great looking.
I heard that, too.
Oh! Sorry.
Just keep your mind on the job.
But I told Enzo not to go into the games alone.
Yes, but did you tell him to move if one was dropping on him?

[thinking]
Wow... Dot looks amazing. What a babe.
I heard that.
What? Did I say it or just think it?
You thought it. We're telepathic, it's part of our game character.
Oh, sorry. I better be more careful of what I say, ah... think.
That'll be a first.
In all my years as a web surfer I don't think I've ever seen anybody do something so stupid.
Now you've done it... Megabyte is gonna be mad!
Ah, what's new? I miss Bob.
What? You crazy?
Bob always stopped us before we could do anything really bad... Now, nobody does...
You don't have to fight me, Bob. Think about it... we could be a great team...
I'd rather be erased.
Your choice.
What? A guardian?
There's no guardian here. I'm Matrix... a renegade.
Please, renegade... mercy.
Mercy? To a virus? Never...
She's too young to end-file, too young to quit without saving!
No way... this isn't a game, I did this... and I didn't make myself any smarter... I made everyone else dumber!
Did you hear that? We've got to score as many points as possible... or we're all... wiped out.
Don't worry, coach, I will help you win.
We will help you win.
Yep, you got it, Enzo.
Winning is our format.
Consider it inputted.
No problem.
Um... there's just one thing...
Yes?
What are points?
AHHHHHH! We're all going to be nullified!
You can't... do this... it goes against everything you stand for.
You took away my life... destroyed my home... caused nothing but pain and suffering to everyone I held dear!
Why yes... it is... young Enzo Matrix home from the games... my how you've grown...
[Matrix grabs his gun]
and such toys... does your sister know you're playing with them?
[Matrix aims his gun at Megabyte]
Where's that annoying chatter of yours? Megabreath this and Megabarf that! Why don't you put that gun away, boy, and try fighting like a real sprite?
[AndrAIa puts her hand on Enzo's hand]
Your icon. What if it doesn't work?
I am a game sprite. If trapped here I can survive. That's all I knew before I met you, Enzo.
I have prepared something for just such an emergency.
You're prepared for a giant monster made entirely of nulls stomping around Mainframe?
That is correct!
How do you plan for that?
Lucky guess? but first, we must get you into your uniforms.
F.A.B
Problem?
You could say that. These two booted into the game and tried to win it by setting off an explosion capable of destroying the planet!
Bad idea.
Yes. Especially when you're INSIDE THE PLANET! Why'd you do it?
I had to, mister!
And all he did was keep saying, "make it so".
And "engage"! I said "engage" more times than "make it so" actually.
Tea? Earl Grey? Hot? What in the net is that?

[in a hologram]
You have what you need. Now, use his...
Use what, Phong?
Use his greed.

[Hologram disappears]
Phong?
[shouts]
Phong!

[just after she reboots]
Pixelatious! I'm a biker babe.
You guys are never going to catch me before the wall drops.
Yeah and why is that?
Because you delayed.
Logic error.
[chasing after Bob]
We are going to make it. Yes, sir, we are going to make it. We'll make it. We will definitely make it.

[Megabyte watches Hack and Slash over the Vid Window just before they crash into the game cube wall]
They're not going to make it. Blam! Clean up crew. Level 1.
Enzo! It's the guardian protocol. He can't help himself.
That's all fine and dandy for Enzo but AndrAIa is a game sprite. Win or lose when the game goes...
AndrAIa goes with it!

[Enzo watching the Surfer change]
It's a special gift I have.
Gift my asecplate. What are you anyways?
I'm a search engine. Second generation.
We're online!
How's the power source?
She's the same as ever.

[AndrAIA has walked into a game room holding The User, who looks like Austin Powers]
That's The User? What happened to his pants?
You don't want to know. What do we do to win this one?
targeting.

[á la Austin Powers]
Huh?... karma, don't fail me now!
[outside view of the game cube]
["bang" sound effect]
Game Over.
[a Vid-Window of Megabyte opens behind Hack and Slash]
Hack! Slash!

[to Hack]
He means us.

[turning to face Vid-Window]
Yes, boss!
Ah, you rang, your hugeness?
All ready and waiting, oh evil one! Oh!
[to Hack]
Did I say "evil"?
Oh, what a giveaway.
I said "evil" once but I think I got away with it.
*Three* times!
What?
You said it *three* times!
What, "evil"?
That's four!
Oh, I hate that.
Silence!
I live in the games. I search through systems, peoples and cities for this place. Mainframe. My home. My format? I have no format. I am a renegade, lost on the Net. ReBoot!
I come from the Net. I've searched through systems, peoples and cities for this sprite. Bob. My friend. My format? I have no format. I am a renegade, lost in the Web.
[repeated line]
Free, for only 99, 99, 99!
You're all mine now.
[repeated line]
incoming game.
Crikey, Binky, I think we've bought it!
Again, sir?
What?
What phase number was walking Nibbles?
There is no number for walking Nibbles.
So that means he just ran away.
Yep,that is right. He ran away alright.
He's gone.
He is, look at him go
[both scream]
My body armor took some big hits out there Phong, anything you got would help.
I have said it before, and I will say it again.
This is not the supercomputer.
